r.s: PHP extension for interfacing with Redis
r.d: This extension provides an API for communicating with Redis servers.

phpredis 6.0.1
This release contains fix for unknown expiration modifier issue as well as memory leak and segfault in exec function and small documentation improvements.
You can find a detailed list of changes in CHANGELOG.md and package.xml or by inspecting the git commit logs.
* Fix memory leak and segfault in Redis::exec [362e1141] (Pavlo Yatsukhnenko), (Markus Podar) * Fix unknown expiration modifier [264c0c7e, 95bd184b] (Pavlo Yatsukhnenko) * Update documentation [3674d663, 849bedb6, 1ad95b63] (Till Kruss), (Joost OrangeJuiced)
